title: Strictly Come Dancing 2019 Movie Week: something special happening as celebrities raise their act
text:
What an utterly fab-u-lous Movie Week, the first real ‘event’ of the Strictly calendar.

From the moment Telegraph ‘Under The Glitterball’ Strictly columnist Michelle Visage and Giovanni Pernice hit the floor with a sparkling quickstep from Cabaret, to the finale when a blue-painted Dev Patel and Dianne Buswell wowed the audience with the first Couple’s Choice of the series, a street dance routine to Friend Like Me from Aladdin, if you didn’t have a grin from ear to ear, you really should have checked your pulse.

You could feel the enjoyment of the celebrities performing blazing through the screen, and the costumes were terrific. For a series which began with many people not aware of who many...
description: What an utterly fab-u-lous Movie Week, the first real ‘event’ of the Strictly calendar.
